text: @HumanityForward My daughter needs the help. She has 2 kids.. 1 special needs: no day are will take him cuz he is too Autistic or not autistic enough: now with no school she may have to quit her job to watch him. Her husband is getting laid off die to the Covid19 crisis! They are trying!!
